definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Xinhua Bookstore, China's largest bookstore chain
Joint Publishing, bookstore chain and publisher, founded in Hong Kong in 1948

sentences.english: The book was out of print, but I eventually ran it to earth at a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 那本書已經絕版，但我終於在一家舊書店淘到了它。

sentences.english: Shanghai, a lot of Spanish books in bookstores.
sentences.chinese: 上海的書店有很多西班牙語的書籍。

sentences.english: One day, I made an appointment with Wang Ping togo to the bookstore together on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我和王萍相約週日一路去書店。

sentences.english: Xiao Yang went to the bookstore and book shop, the boss told her to wait until the phone.
sentences.chinese: 楊小曼去書店訂書，店老闆告訴她等到了電話聯繫。

sentences.english: A modern office building is standing on the site of the old bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 一座現代化辦公大樓矗立在這家書店的故址上。

sentences.english: We went to the Xinhua Bookstore to buy books at two o'clock in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午兩點我們去新華書店去買書。

sentences.english: The men fled from the One Way Street bookshop before anyone could catch them.
sentences.chinese: 之後兩名男子從單向街書店逃逸。

sentences.english: The report in CD-ROM format is now available for sale at the online Government Bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 年報以光碟出版，現已在網上政府書店有售。

sentences.english: Well, I met him once in a bookstore and he was buying Lady Chatterley's Lover.
sentences.chinese: 我在書店碰到過他一次，他在買查泰萊夫人的情人。

sentences.english: These magazines are sold at bookstores throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 這些雜誌在全國各地書店均有發售。

sentences.english: I got this book by chance at a second-hand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 趕巧在一家舊書店裏買到這本書。

sentences.english: In junior high, she joined a manga club in a local bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 初中時，她加入當地一家書店創辦的漫畫俱樂部。

sentences.english: The shop assistants in this bookstore are ever ready FOR inquiry and service.
sentences.chinese: 這家書店的售貨員百問不厭，百拿不煩。

sentences.english: All the world's a page at El Ateneo, a bookshop converted from an old theatre in downtown Buenos Aires.
sentences.chinese: 這是由布宜諾斯艾利斯鬧市一家老劇院改的豪華書店。

sentences.english: Can I pick up my Corporate Purchase at my eslite bookstore?
sentences.chinese: 可以到誠品書店的門市去取企業團購的商品嗎？

sentences.english: There are a few Indian online bookstores, but they take weeks to deliver.
sentences.chinese: 少數的本地網絡書店提供郵遞，但時間往往長達幾周。

definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
to read a book/to study/to attend school
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
